name: FunFair Shooter 2 (TriJam#197)
description:
FunFair Shooter 2 (TriJam#197) "Split up"

Welcome to the next shooting range in the "FunFair Shooter" Series.

This time it's Darts. Well... one Dart. You only have one shot. Hit the Bulls Eye to get another shot, but: Your target will split up into two targets!

Try to hit them as fast as you can, the more perfect hits you make in a row, the higher the score multiplier gets!

Take the highscore challenge!

Written in 3 hours in a team of three for TriJam#197.

Cheers,

Grisgram, elKortes and Baeblsh
